main.main51: Deciding which partner to invest in a car wash with can be difficult, and the multitude of options available can be overwhelming. The choices you make will affect your entire business, so choose high-quality solutions and development opportunities. Our
main.main57: and comprehensive service of professional consultants is the recipe for your success.
main.main62: Vacuum cleaners, changing machines, washing chemicals
main.main68: Our goal is the business success of our clients
main.main69: Modern technologies are a tool for achieving the main goal of our company - meeting the business expectations of our customers. Thanks to this approach, we continue to introduce the latest technologies, while maintaining the highest quality of products.
main.main70: We comprehensively accompany our clients at every stage of investment, each of them gets their own supervisor, who will guide you step by step through the entire process of building a car wash, pointing out not only the advantages, but also the disadvantages of individual solutions. And once invested, Samwash staff will also be fully available to you.
main.main74: The success of a business based on a car wash depends not only on the location, but also on the services offered there. That is why we have been developing accessories and technologies for various industries for years. Thanks to this, our customers can customize the car wash taking into account factors such as geographical location, business conditions, current legislation and others.
main.main75: SOLUTIONS ARE INDIVIDUAL FOR OUR CLIENTS
main.main81: The ability to quickly and easily open a car wash next to another object gives potential investors many opportunities for earning. However, a car wash as a single business, and not just an additional service, is also a good idea. This is an investment that does not require special participation of the owner in everyday operation. And all this thanks to the automation offered by Samwash. You only need to find a good location, for example, near a large housing estate or a busy road, and earnings are guaranteed.
main.main82: Building a car wash in a shopping center is becoming an increasingly popular solution. At a time when everyone wants to have everything at hand, adding a car wash to the shopping center's services is a guarantee of reaching a large number of potential customers. Because family shopping is an opportunity to wash the car. When one family member goes shopping, the other usually uses that time to wash the car. Saving time for the client of the center - an opportunity to earn money at the car wash.
main.main83: A contactless car wash is a great idea for expanding the range of gas station services. Nowadays, it is an integral element of the station, expected by the driver. Both objects complement each other and allow you to increase your income. Thanks to the proximity of the car wash station, it is always within reach of potential customers. It also allows you to implement a profitable loyalty system that can support both the station and the car wash.
main.main84: Washing a car in a facility such as a workshop (body shop, paint shop, auto mechanics) or a tire fitting service will allow you to get additional income without high costs. In the case of vulcanization, this will allow you to make money in the off-season by changing tires. After the repair, the client of the workshop will be happy to use the car wash service, which will complement the comprehensive care of the vehicle. And the opportunity to give the client a cleaned car after an expensive repair will help you win the favor of drivers.
main.main88: Increase the popularity of your car wash
main.main90: All car wash in your phone
main.main91: Learn more about the car wash manager
main.main93: Lack of change is not a problem
main.main95: BE LOYAL is an application that allows you to make mobile payments at Samwash car washes. The solution is intended for all Samwash car wash owners who want to offer their customers a loyalty program and increase revenue at their car wash.
main.main96: The Carwash Manager application allows you to remotely control both one car wash and the entire network. From any place and at a time convenient for you, with the help of a smartphone or computer, you will receive the necessary information about the condition of the car wash, check its settings and financial results.
main.main97: The Samwash replacement machine is one of the most important additional devices for a car wash, which significantly increases profits. It allows you to exchange banknotes or use loyalty cards and bank cards.
main.main101: What our customers say about us
main.main110: Manufacturer of professional sinks - modern solutions for your business
main.main111: As an experienced car wash manufacturer, we focus on professionalism and innovation. That is why we equipped our car washes
main.main113: which facilitate the day-to-day management of a car wash business. Thanks to our advanced IT solutions, we create innovative car washes that can be controlled remotely via the Internet. Having decided to cooperate with us, you will have a permanent impact on your business, increasing the competitiveness and attractiveness of the offered services. Additional devices that you can order from us will help you create a professional care and auto chemistry center. Among them you will find, in particular: a banknote machine, vacuum cleaners, a windshield washer dispenser. Especially for you, we will also adjust the appearance of the car wash to your liking. Thanks to this, you will maintain an unchanged image of your company.
main.main114: The long-term work of the manufacturer of car washes has shown that the basis is a comprehensive approach to the client. Therefore, by choosing our services, you receive comprehensive support during the entire process of investment implementation and after its completion.
main.main115: The manufacturer of car washes is a partnership that will pay off for you
main.main116: Every investment needs a moment of thought. As a manufacturer of car washes, we realize that profit is a key issue for every customer. Therefore, when creating our car washes and developing new solutions, we do everything to provide our customers with the best experience. We are focused on partnership and cooperation, which allows us to adapt the product according to your expectations and preferences. Technology is one thing, visuals that attract customers are also an important aspect. One of them is the attractive appearance of the structure. During the implementation of the project, you can decide what markings, signs and lighting your sink will have. We have several attractive ready-made types of structures waiting for you.
main.main118: an experienced manufacturer of car washes
main.main119: we care about our customers. Therefore, cooperation with us has many advantages. Basically, this is a guarantee of investing in a car wash of the latest generation, which will quickly pay off and bring a satisfactory profit. We have many solutions. It is up to you whether to choose a gantry car wash, a modular car wash or a container car wash. We invite you to familiarize yourself with our offer, which we can adapt to each client. We are distinguished by excellent IT solutions and professionalism!

privacy-policy.privacy-policyMeta: Privacy Policy | SamWash self-service car wash
privacy-policy.privacy-policyMetaDesc: SamWash's privacy policy ensures that your privacy and confidentiality of information is protected and respected. We understand the importance of your personal information and strive to ensure the safety of every user of our service
privacy-policy.a1: The privacy of our website users is very important to us and we make every effort to ensure that it is protected. This policy explains how we use your personal information.
privacy-policy.a2: By agreeing to the use of cookies on your first visit to our website, in accordance with the provisions of these Rules, you give us permission to use cookies on each subsequent visit.
privacy-policy.b1: This document was created using a template from the SEQ Legal website (seqlegal.com) and modified by the Plantpol-Ukraine website
privacy-policy.c1: The following types of personal data are subject to collection, storage and use:
privacy-policy.c2: 1. Information about your computer, including your IP address, geographic location, browser type and version, and operating system;
privacy-policy.c3: 2. Information about your visits to and use of this website, including referral sources, length of visits, pages viewed, and site navigation paths;
privacy-policy.c4: 3. Information about your email address and/or phone number that you used to register on our website;
privacy-policy.c5: 4. Information you entered when creating a profile on our website - your first name, last name, shipping address;
privacy-policy.c6: 5. Information generated when you use our website, including information about the time, frequency and conditions of your use;
privacy-policy.c7: 6. Information regarding any purchases you make, services you use, or transactions you make through our website, including your name, address, telephone number, email address, and credit card information;
privacy-policy.c8: 7. Information generated when you use our website, including information about the time, frequency and conditions of your use;
privacy-policy.c9: 8. Information regarding any purchases you make, services you use, or transactions you make through our website, including your name, address, telephone number, email address, and credit card information;
privacy-policy.c10: 9. Information contained in any communications you send to us by email or through our website, including message content and metadata;
privacy-policy.c11: 10. Any other personal information you have sent to us.
privacy-policy.c12: Before disclosing a third party's personal information to us, you must obtain that person's consent both to the disclosure and to the processing of that information in accordance with these rules.
privacy-policy.d: D. Use of Your Personal Information
privacy-policy.d1: The personal information you provide to us through our website will be used for the purposes set out in these policies or on the relevant pages of the website. We may use your personal information for the following purposes
privacy-policy.d2: - administration of our website and business;
privacy-policy.d4: - providing you with the opportunity to use the services available on our website;
privacy-policy.d5: - sending you goods purchased through our website;
privacy-policy.d6: - providing you with services purchased through our website;
privacy-policy.d7: - sending you messages, bills and reminders;
privacy-policy.d8: - about payment and receipt of payments from you;
privacy-policy.d10: - sending you e-mail messages that you have specifically requested;
privacy-policy.d11: - sending you an electronic newsletter, if you have ordered it (you can inform us at any time that you no longer wish to receive electronic newsletters from us);
privacy-policy.d12: - sending you marketing messages about our business activities or the business activities of carefully selected third-party companies that we think may be of interest to you, by posting or, if you have specifically given your consent, by sending e-mail or by using similar technologies ( you can inform us at any time that you no longer wish to receive marketing communications);
privacy-policy.d13: - providing statistical information about our users to third-party companies (however, these third-party companies will not be able to identify any individual user from this data);
privacy-policy.d14: - handling inquiries and complaints made by you or about you and relating to our website;
privacy-policy.d15: - in order to ensure the security of our site and prevent fraud;
privacy-policy.d16: - for the purpose of checking compliance with the terms and conditions governing the use of our website (including monitoring of private messages sent through the private message service of our website);
privacy-policy.d18: If you have provided personal information for publication on our website, we will publish it. Otherwise, we will use this information in accordance with the license you have granted us.
privacy-policy.d19: Your privacy settings may be used to restrict the publication of your personal data on our website, and may be adjusted through the website's privacy controls.
privacy-policy.d20: Without your express consent, we will not share your personal information with any third-party company for direct marketing use by that or any other third-party company.
privacy-policy.f1: We reserve the right to disclose your personal information to any of our employees, managers, policyholders, professional advisors, agents, suppliers or subcontractors, to the extent and for the purposes set forth in these policies.
privacy-policy.f2: We reserve the right to disclose your personal information to any member of our group of companies (this includes our subsidiaries, our ultimate holding company and all of its subsidiaries) to the extent and for the purposes set out in these policies.
privacy-policy.f3: We reserve the right to disclose your personal information:
privacy-policy.f4: - in those cases in which the law requires us to do so;
privacy-policy.f5: - in connection with any current or future legal proceedings;
privacy-policy.f6: - to establish, exercise or protect our legal rights (including providing information to other parties to prevent fraud or reduce credit risks);
privacy-policy.f7: - to a buyer (or potential buyer) of any business or assets that we are selling (or intending to sell); and to any person who, in our reasonable opinion, may apply to a court or other authorized body for the disclosure of that personal data and, in our reasonable opinion, that court or authorized body will issue an order for the disclosure of that personal data.
privacy-policy.f8: We will not disclose your personal information to third parties, except for the cases specified in these rules.
privacy-policy.e: G. Protection of your personal information
privacy-policy.e1: 1. We will take adequate technical and organizational measures to prevent the loss, unlawful use or falsification of your personal information.
privacy-policy.e2: 2. We will store all personal information provided by you on our protected (both password and firewall) servers.
privacy-policy.e3: 3. All electronic financial transactions made using our site will be protected by data encryption technology.
privacy-policy.e4: 4. You acknowledge that the transmission of information over the Internet is inherently insecure and we cannot guarantee the security of data sent over the World Wide Web.
privacy-policy.e5: 5. You are solely responsible for keeping your password to access our website confidential. We will never ask for your password (except when you try to log in to your account on our site)
privacy-policy.g1: We reserve the right to periodically make changes and amendments to these rules and publish their new version on our website. You should check this web page periodically to make sure you understand the changes made to these rules.
privacy-policy.g2: We may also notify you of changes to these policies by sending you an email or through our site's private messaging system.
privacy-policy.l1: Our website contains hyperlinks to, and details about, the websites of third party companies and individuals. We are not
privacy-policy.l2: have management tools, and are not responsible for the privacy policies and practices of third parties and companies in this field.
privacy-policy.m1: Please notify us promptly if your personal information we hold needs to be updated or corrected.

carwash-manager.manager2: Remote control of a car wash anywhere in the world
carwash-manager.manager3: Are you planning to place car washes in many cities in Poland? Do you want to manage them effectively? Samwash Cawash Manager is the solution for you! An intuitive and secure application will allow you to monitor your sinks from anywhere in the world. As an investor, you are free to travel and vacation abroad while managing your business. When you choose to manage your car wash remotely, you receive regular reports via e-mail, and you also have an idea of the condition of the machines, which allows you to detect faults at an early stage and organize service assistance. Thanks to the provided parameters, you will be able to effectively adjust the parameters of the car wash. Samwash car washes contain as many as several dozen different sensors that monitor the technical condition of the machines. You can track it in your app.
carwash-manager.manager4: When you are connected to the Internet, managing your car wash in the cloud becomes very easy. Samwash Cawash Manager constantly sends messages about what is happening in your facility. That way you won't miss a single failure. With such a program, doing business is no longer a difficult task. A car wash without access to the Carwash Manager program requires frequent visits, in particular: to check the operation or read the current turnover. Remote control of the car wash helps to save time and avoid many unpleasant situations, for example, a long breakdown.
carwash-manager.manager5: Samwash Carwash Manager - Why is it worth it?
carwash-manager.manager6: There are many reasons why you should connect your car wash to the Carwash Manager remote control system. Managing your business remotely gives you more control over it, whenever you want. It will also help you monitor your traffic and current earnings. In this way, you can, among other things: quickly decide to expand a given object when it turns out that it is frequently visited. In addition, the remote control of the car wash through the application supports and facilitates the management of the customer's car fleet. What does this really mean to you? Cards can be purchased through an exchange or topped up remotely. You are also notified by email about crashes. You can also continuously report service requests when you notice a malfunction. Thus, you can easily manage all the processes of your car wash.
carwash-manager.manager7: Car wash management in the cloud is an innovative solution. We are constantly improving all processes to provide you with the highest level of service. Using Samwash Cawash Manager may be necessary if you have several car washes in different cities. Traveling to certain places will definitely be a hassle. In such situations, the system is a great solution that will always keep your business close at hand. You can check statistics and open notifications whenever you want. Remote control of the car wash will allow you to worry no more. You will easily learn about the turnover and traffic at the car wash, and you will easily pick up the change machine. With analysis and reports, it will be easier for you to make the right business decisions. Don't wait, see the benefits of Samwash Cawash Manager for yourself!

service.ourTeam: Our team is here to support you 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year. You are never alone and always have access to our extensive support network.
service.fastDelivery: We provide fast delivery of wearing parts and spare parts with the help of professional management.
service.fastDelivery2: Our technical support department is engaged in the delivery of spare parts, supports maintenance, dispatches company cars of our service technicians, who provide a huge range of services on site. If the necessary parts are not available remotely, we guarantee the fast delivery of the necessary structural elements with the help of our modern logistics system.
service.fastDelivery3: Thanks to the logistics chain in production, which is optimized according to the technological process, we have stocks of almost all spare parts.
service.fastDelivery4Bold: Order spare parts - receive your product the very next day!

service.helpYou2: Demographic analysis and development of working drawings according to DBN
service.helpYou3: Coordination of the project with contractors, engineers and architects
service.withHelp: With SamWash group, you can lead
service.techServ: SamWash Group Technical Service provides preventative maintenance and remote support to ensure you always get the fastest and most efficient help, no matter the situation. Also, take advantage of different maintenance packages to avoid worries and unpleasant surprises. Let us take care of everything!

service.ulLi6_3: Delivery of special parts at the request of the customer after agreement on delivery terms

service.ourTeamWillAdvise: Our team will advise you on the best pre-washes, shampoos, gels and waxes and help you achieve the best results. Use our chemical products services and trust SamWash Group products.
service.yourCarWashMust: Your car wash must adapt to the digital world. Connect all your equipment to collect and analyze financial and user behavior data, and remotely manage and monitor your equipment. Take full advantage of aggregated data with the help of the Internet and set up a truly intelligent business so that your users can get the best benefit from washing.
service.yourCarWashMustAdapt: Your car wash must adapt to the digital world. Connect all your equipment to collect and analyze financial and user behavior data, and remotely manage and monitor your equipment. Take full advantage of aggregated data with the help of the Internet and set up a truly intelligent business so that your users can get the best benefit from washing.
service.keepYourEquipment: Keep your equipment always in perfect condition with the help of our spare parts department. Take care of your equipment using genuine parts of the same quality as the SamWash group and extend the life of your business with timely maintenance.
service.importantToUnderstand: It is important to understand that staff training is primarily of interest to the company itself. After all, the success of a car wash depends on the qualifications of your staff.
service.trainingAtTheVeryStart: training at the very start, when a new employee is just starting to perform his duties.
service.inTheProcessOfWhich: training, in the process of which employees improve their knowledge and skills.
service.learningNewSkillsAndAbilities: learning new skills and abilities. If you transfer an employee to a completely new position or the requirements for the current profession change.
service.productsWithGuaranteed: Products with guaranteed quality and safety!
service.inAdditionToOurInnovativeProducts: In addition to our innovative products, we also offer the highest level of service quality during the installation, commissioning, maintenance and repair of our installations. Thanks to the continuous training of our service and installation specialists in the field of organization, safety and technology, we guarantee an effective working approach that takes into account all aspects of safety.
